attributes.action: pass legislation to make it illegal for people with Scotish residency to hold office in the English parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that English voters don't have any influence over Scotland's affairs it is wrong that Scotish voters and residents can influence England's parliamentary make-up and even hold office.  Please sign this petition to change this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
